name: Reinforce Warning
_source: s;SoldierRed;Commander Lycon! Percy prevailed at Castle Verstadt!
s;Lycon;That's fantastic news. A monumental step in liberating these lands!
s;SoldierRed;Aye. And he sends reinforcements back to help defend the fort.
s;Lycon;Good timing, seeing a group of loyalists is attacking.{w}{br}We'll continue defending awhile longer, but we'll appreciate the help.
